column4: dear jrib,I have recovered the grub,I see all the partition but If I try to hit enter on "Ubuntu 7.10" I get the message "error 17.Cannot mount selected partition",If I try to run windows partition I get "error 13: invalid or unsupported executable file"
check that menu.lst is pointing to the right partition
yes, just mount your partition.  Though you can also just hit 'e' at the grub menu and it will let you edit the lines it is going to boot
